md:
giải nghĩa từ "edits" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

### 2.1. Edits

* Edits (noun) - các bản sửa đổi
	+ Meaning: Changes made to a text, image, or other digital content to improve or correct it.
	+ Example: "The editor made several edits to the article before publishing it."
	+ Related words: revision, correction, modification
	+ Antonyms: original, unchanged

### 2.2. Edits

* Edits (verb) - sửa đổi
	+ Meaning: To make changes to a text, image, or other digital content to improve or correct it.
	+ Example: "She edits the video to make it more engaging."
	+ Related words: revise, correct, modify
	+ Antonyms: leave unchanged, preserve

### 2.3. Edits

* Edits (plural noun) - các bản sửa đổi
	+ Meaning: A collection of changes made to a text, image, or other digital content.
	+ Example: "The edits were made to improve the clarity of the instructions."
	+ Related words: revisions, corrections, modifications
	+ Antonyms: originals, unedited versions

Note: The meanings and examples provided are based on the context of digital content creation and editing. The word "edits" can have different meanings and connotations in other contexts.

2.1. Edits

  • Edits (noun) - các bản sửa đổi
    • Meaning: Changes made to a text, image, or other digital content to improve or correct it.

2.2. Edits

    • Example: "She edits the video to make it more engaging."
    • Related words: revise, correct, modify

2.3. Edits

Note: The meanings and examples provided are based on the context of digital content creation and editing. The word "edits" can have different meanings and connotations in other contexts.
